languages.text: "Но мне надоело жить чужими историями. Хочу рассказать свою. Уж не знаю, когда и как ей суждено прерваться, но я приложу все силы, чтобы когда-нибудь кто-нибудь рассказал хоть одну потешную байку об Идире Тласс. И я не могу придумать способа это сделать лучше, чем стоя с вами плечом к плечу, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Но мне надоело жить чужими историями. Хочу рассказать свою. Уж не знаю, когда и как ей суждено прерваться, но я приложу все силы, чтобы когда-нибудь кто-нибудь рассказал хоть одну потешную байку об Идире Тласс. И я не могу придумать способа это сделать лучше, чем стоя с вами плечом к плечу, {name}".

languages.text: "But I'm tired of living other people's stories. I want to tell my own. I don't know when or how mine will come to an end, but I'm going to do everything I can to make sure that somebody someday tells at least one decent story about Idira Tlass. And I can't think of a better way to do that than by standing shoulder to shoulder with you, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Но мне надоело жить чужими историями. Хочу рассказать свою. Уж не знаю, когда и как ей суждено прерваться, но я приложу все силы, чтобы когда-нибудь кто-нибудь рассказал хоть одну потешную байку об Идире Тласс. И я не могу придумать способа это сделать лучше, чем стоя с вами плечом к плечу, {name}".

I don't know when or how mine will come to an end, but I'm going to do everything I can to make sure that somebody someday tells at least one decent story about Idira Tlass. And I can't think of a better way to do that than by standing shoulder to shoulder with you, {name}."

languages.text: “但我已经受够了活在别人的故事里，我想讲述我自己的故事。我也不知道我的故事什么时候会结束，会如何结束，但我会尽我所能，保证日后有人谈起伊迪拉·特拉斯时，至少能讲出一个像样的故事。如果想实现这个目标，恐怕没有比与你并肩作战更好的办法了，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "But I'm tired of living other people's stories. I want to tell my own. I don't know when or how mine will come to an end, but I'm going to do everything I can to make sure that somebody someday tells at least one decent story about Idira Tlass. And I can't think of a better way to do that than by standing shoulder to shoulder with you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “但我已经受够了活在别人的故事里，我想讲述我自己的故事。我也不知道我的故事什么时候会结束，会如何结束，但我会尽我所能，保证日后有人谈起伊迪拉·特拉斯时，至少能讲出一个像样的故事。如果想实现这个目标，恐怕没有比与你并肩作战更好的办法了，{name}。”

languages.original_text: "But I'm tired of living other people's stories. I want to tell my own. I don't know when or how mine will come to an end, but I'm going to do everything I can to make sure that somebody someday tells at least one decent story about Idira Tlass. And I can't think of a better way to do that than by standing shoulder to shoulder with you, ."

languages.text: «Pero estoy harta de vivir en las historias de otras personas. Quiero contar la mía. No sé cuándo ni cómo acabará, pero haré todo lo que esté en mi mano para asegurarme de que alguien, algún día, cuente al menos una historia decente sobre Idira Tlass. Y no puedo imaginar una forma mejor de conseguirlo que trabajando hombro con hombro con usted, {name}».
languages.original_text: "But I'm tired of living other people's stories. I want to tell my own. I don't know when or how mine will come to an end, but I'm going to do everything I can to make sure that somebody someday tells at least one decent story about Idira Tlass. And I can't think of a better way to do that than by standing shoulder to shoulder with you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Pero estoy harta de vivir en las historias de otras personas. Quiero contar la mía. No sé cuándo ni cómo acabará, pero haré todo lo que esté en mi mano para asegurarme de que alguien, algún día, cuente al menos una historia decente sobre Idira Tlass. Y no puedo imaginar una forma mejor de conseguirlo que trabajando hombro con hombro con usted, {name}».

languages.text: 「でも、他人の物語を生きるのはもう疲れた。自分の物語を語りたい。私の物語がいつ、どのように終わるのか分からないけれど、いつか誰かがイディラ・トラスについて少なくとも一つのまともな物語を語れるよう、私は全力を尽くすつもり。そのためには、あなたと肩を並べること以上にいい方法はないと思うの、{name}」
languages.original_text: "But I'm tired of living other people's stories. I want to tell my own. I don't know when or how mine will come to an end, but I'm going to do everything I can to make sure that somebody someday tells at least one decent story about Idira Tlass. And I can't think of a better way to do that than by standing shoulder to shoulder with you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「でも、他人の物語を生きるのはもう疲れた。自分の物語を語りたい。私の物語がいつ、どのように終わるのか分からないけれど、いつか誰かがイディラ・トラスについて少なくとも一つのまともな物語を語れるよう、私は全力を尽くすつもり。そのためには、あなたと肩を並べること以上にいい方法はないと思うの、{name}」

languages.text: "Aber ich bin es leid, anderer Leute Geschichten zu leben. Ich will meine eigene erzählen. Ich weiß nicht, wann oder wie die meine enden wird. Doch ich werde alles tun, damit eines Tages irgendjemand wenigstens eine ordentliche Geschichte über Idira Tlass erzählen kann. Und mir fällt kein besserer Weg ein, das zu erreichen, als Schulter an Schulter mit Euch zu stehen, {name}."
languages.original_text: "But I'm tired of living other people's stories. I want to tell my own. I don't know when or how mine will come to an end, but I'm going to do everything I can to make sure that somebody someday tells at least one decent story about Idira Tlass. And I can't think of a better way to do that than by standing shoulder to shoulder with you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Aber ich bin es leid, anderer Leute Geschichten zu leben. Ich will meine eigene erzählen. Ich weiß nicht, wann oder wie die meine enden wird. Doch ich werde alles tun, damit eines Tages irgendjemand wenigstens eine ordentliche Geschichte über Idira Tlass erzählen kann. Und mir fällt kein besserer Weg ein, das zu erreichen, als Schulter an Schulter mit Euch zu stehen, {name}."

languages.text: « Mais j'en ai marre de vivre par procuration. Je veux raconter ma propre histoire. Je ne sais pas quand ou comment la mienne prendra fin, mais je ferai en sorte que quelqu'un puisse un jour raconter une histoire digne de ce nom sur Idira Tlass. Et à vos côtés, je suis sûre que ça arrivera, {name} ! »
languages.original_text: "But I'm tired of living other people's stories. I want to tell my own. I don't know when or how mine will come to an end, but I'm going to do everything I can to make sure that somebody someday tells at least one decent story about Idira Tlass. And I can't think of a better way to do that than by standing shoulder to shoulder with you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Mais j'en ai marre de vivre par procuration. Je veux raconter ma propre histoire. Je ne sais pas quand ou comment la mienne prendra fin, mais je ferai en sorte que quelqu'un puisse un jour raconter une histoire digne de ce nom sur Idira Tlass. Et à vos côtés, je suis sûre que ça arrivera, {name} ! »

languages.text: "Ancak başkalarının hikâyelerinde yaşamaktan bitap düştüm. Artık kendi hikâyemi anlatmak istiyorum. Benimki ne zaman ve nasıl sonlanır, bilemem ama bir gün birileri çıkıp İdira Tlass'ın tek bir güzel hikâyesini anlatsın diye elimden geleni ardıma koymayacağım. Bunu başarmak için omuz omuza mücadelelerimizden daha iyi bir yol düşünemiyorum {name}."
languages.original_text: "But I'm tired of living other people's stories. I want to tell my own. I don't know when or how mine will come to an end, but I'm going to do everything I can to make sure that somebody someday tells at least one decent story about Idira Tlass. And I can't think of a better way to do that than by standing shoulder to shoulder with you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak diğerlerinin hikâyelerinde yaşamaktan bitap düştüm. Artık kendi hikâyemi anlatmak istiyorum. Benimki ne zaman ve nasıl sonlanır, bilemem ama bir gün birileri çıkıp İdira Tlass'ın tek bir güzel hikâyesini anlatsın diye elimden geleni ardıma koymayacağım. Bunu başarmak için omuz omuza mücadelelerimizden daha iyi bir yol düşünemiyorum {name}."
